audio.title: Audio
audio.description: Audio file for avatar. Supports .mp3/.wav/.m4a/.aac, max 5MB.

image.title: Image
image.description: Avatar reference image. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB, dimensions >= 300px, aspect ratio 1:2.5 to 2.5:1.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Positive text prompt to define avatar actions, emotions, and camera movements.
